titles: Dumbritons Castle dolefull commendations to all the rascall rogues within thir [sic] nations
author: A. B. C.
notes: Verse - "VVe your wretch'd brethren in Dumbriton fort,".
Signed at end: Finis quod A.B.C. Sions friend.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
